'''v0.15.4 alpha''' is a minor update to [[Pocket Edition]], [[Gear VR Edition]], and the [[Windows 10 Edition]] Beta released on July 28-29, 2016 to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.15.3 alpha|v0.15.3]]. For all non-Android platforms, this includes bug fixes from v0.15.3.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/http://www.mojang.com/2016/07/changelog-0154-for-pocket-and-windows-10-is-big-and-evil/|title=It's big. It's bad. It's changelog 0.15.4 for Pocket & Win 10!|website=[[Mojang.com]]}}</ref>

This version was the base for the [[New Nintendo 3DS Edition 0.1.0|first release]] of [[New Nintendo 3DS Edition]].

== Additions ==
* Animation for Signing in to Xbox Live accounts

===[[Skin/Skin pack|Skin packs]]===
* {{Version exclusive}}: [[Villains Skin Pack]].

== Changes ==
* More localization fixes.
* Fixed the [[HUD]] moving when riding an [[animal]] in VR.
* Fixed a few texture issues.
* Some tweaks to [[Gear VR Edition]] performance & experience.
* Increased draw distance for [[Windows 10 Edition]].

'''Other'''
* Fixed comfort issues caused by [[rain]] & [[Snowfall|snow]] in the player's face in VR.
* [[Lead]] lines no longer disconnect from the hand when jumping in Immersive Mode in Gear VR.
* Leads now display the correct texture & don’t cause crashes in Gear VR.
* Fixed a crash on the [[inventory]] screen.
* [[Horse]] container screen now keeps labels visible.
* [[Bone meal]] and [[spawn egg]]s now consumed in [[Survival mode]].
* B button to quit from the main menu works on Windows 10 edition now.
* Fixed a crash when creating or entering a new world.
* Fixed a crash when traveling the world with render distance set to maximum.
* Worlds with UTF-8 symbols in their name are now displayed in the Play tab for Win 10.
* Fixed some issues with players creating new realms.
